column5: Hi all. I've been looking to make one last trip with the boys this summer (what's left of it) and have been trying to look for a pontoon rental anywhere within 2 to 2.5hrs from the GTA. I've been calling around and the earliest I can seem to find one is for 8am. Anyone have any suggestions for a rental place that offers something earlier? Thanks!

Seems Port Perry Marina on Lake Scugog opens at 7am on weekends after the Labour Day Weekend.  http://www.portperrymarina.ca/Home/MarinaLakefrontLocation/Contact.aspx  I'd give them a call at (905) 985-3236
Check out Harris Boat Works  LINK
There's also cedar park rentals in Little Lake Barrie. Always catch fish there.Reservations for weekends,he let's you go at first light and the rental is till nightfall if you wish.
